label: Athletic Footwear and Equipment
description: Market category for athletic footwear and equipment, including running spikes, throwing shoes, and pole vault equipment.
intents: Find the best athletic footwear for my sport.
Buy running spikes for track and field events.
Get the right throwing shoes for my event.
Find pole vault equipment for my training.

subcategories.label: Running Spikes
subcategories.description: Footwear designed for track and field running events.

subcategories.label: Throwing Shoes
subcategories.description: Footwear designed for throwing events, such as shot put and javelin.

subcategories.label: Pole Vault Equipment
subcategories.description: Equipment used for pole vaulting events.
